Cloud Web Hosting At Fraction of Price

At LayerOnline, we focus on providing our clients with quality service and great customer experience. We will not try to waste your time on upselling all the options. All premium features come standard: SSD, AnyCast DNS, CDN, SSL, DDOS Guard, Nginx, isolated hosting environment, free domain in 20 TLDs, Softaculous, Site Builder, daily local backup, one year S3 backup, unlimited bandwidth, unlimited domains, unlimited databases and more.

Time Machine with Cloud Website Backup

Your hosting comes with cloud website backup to with revision history and AES256 encryption. If you website got hacked, accidentally delete files, or you want your old website back, you can go back in time like the hack was never happened, for as far as 12 months back! This feature is exclusive to LayerOnline.

Reliable Service and Support

Our web hosting service is backed by 99.95% Uptime SLA and 30-day money-back guarantee. We provide 24/7 live chat support and ticketing system to resolve the issues instantly in minutes.

Security

Both your client area and cPanel are guarded with two-factor authentication. Every webpage hit is scanned in real-time for threats such as SQL injection and malware. Malware database is updated daily for highest level of security. Your web server is behind and protected by CloudFlare CDN so your web server IP is hidden from attackers. Your websites are also protected by our Anti-DDOS Guard. We backup your website to Amazon S3 with versioning and one year retention so you can always go back in time and restore your website to a previous working version.

Speed

Your websites and DBs are hosted on SSD and distributed with CDN. Your website also resolve faster with AnyCast DNS, With more advanced technologies such as Nginx, your website is among the fastest on the Internet. That means more happier visitors and lower CPC cost.

Interface

Our client area is based on the latest responsive bootstrap interface. It looks beautiful on desktop and any type of mobile devices. The layout was designed so everything is at your fingertips.

Support

You get great around the clock support from our knowledgeable staff within minutes. You can reach us on Facebook, Twitter, online chat, skype, email and our ticketing system.
